View Javadoc
1   package com.medhost.cache.distributed;
2   
3   import com.medhost.cache.CacheData;
4   import org.infinispan.Cache;
5   import org.infinispan.configuration.cache.CacheMode;
6   import org.infinispan.configuration.cache.Configuration;
7   import org.infinispan.configuration.cache.ConfigurationBuilder;
8   import org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration;
9   import org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfigurationBuilder;
10  import org.infinispan.manager.DefaultCacheManager;
11  import org.infinispan.manager.EmbeddedCacheManager;
12  import org.slf4j.Logger;
13  import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
14  
15  /**
16   * Created by pandian on 4/20/15.
17   */
18  public class DistributedCacheLoader implements CacheData {
19  
20      private static Cache<String, String> cache = null;
21      private static Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(DistributedCacheLoader.class);
22  
23      public static final String CACHE_NAME = "default";
24  
25      static {
26          try {
27              Configuration replicationConfiguration = new ConfigurationBuilder()
28                      .clustering()
29                      .cacheMode(CacheMode.REPL_SYNC)
30                      .build();
31  
32              GlobalConfiguration configurationFile = GlobalConfigurationBuilder.defaultClusteredBuilder()
33                      .transport().nodeName(null).addProperty("configurationFile", "/home/pandian/bin/jmeter/jgroups.xml")
34                      .build();
35  
36              EmbeddedCacheManager cacheManager = new DefaultCacheManager(configurationFile, replicationConfiguration);
37  
38              // The only way to get the "repl" cache to be exactly the same as the default cache is to not define it at all
39              cacheManager.defineConfiguration("dist", new ConfigurationBuilder()
40                              .clustering()
41                              .cacheMode(CacheMode.DIST_SYNC)
42                              .hash().numOwners(2)
43                              .build()
44              );
45              cache = cacheManager.getCache(CACHE_NAME);
46  
47          } catch(Throwable th) {
48              th.printStackTrace();
49          }
50      }
51  
52      @Override
53      public void loadData(String data, String value) {
54          cache.put(data, value);
55      }
56  
57      @Override
58      public String getData(String key) {
59          return cache.get(key);
60      }
61  
62      @Override
63      public void unloadData(String key) {
64          cache.remove(key);
65      }
66  
67  
68  }
